mapper.insert: insert into free_board(id, category, board_no, writer, imgurl, title, content) values (#{id}, #{category}, free_board_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{imgurl}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from free_board order by reg_date desc
mapper.update: update free_board set category= #{category}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, imgurl = #{imgurl} where board_no = #{board_no}
update free_board set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
update free_board set like_cnt = like_cnt + 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
update free_board set like_cnt = like_cnt - 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
